short_summary: 14,000 Metric Tons of 3/4 inch well-graded gravel are required for the Department of National Defense.
description: The Department of National Defense requires 14,000 Metric Tons of 3/4 inch well-graded gravel for the supply, delivery, and offloading of 14,000 tons of gravel. The delivery location is specified at 53°41’39.6”N 113°27’59.9”W.
full_summary:
# Gravel Supply and Delivery Tender Notice
### Tender Details
* **Project Reference**: WS4438075918-Doc4498040962
* **Title (English)**: Gravel W0127-23P023
* **Title (French)**: Gravier W0127-23P023
* **Tender Status**: cancelled
* **Amendment Number**: 0

### Tender Info
* **Publication Date**: May 7th, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 3rd, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: May 9th, 2024
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

### Tender Details
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: various Canada-Trade Agreements (see below)

### Agreement Country List
The following trade agreements are applicable to this tender notice:

+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
Not applicable

### Tender Details
* **Regions of Delivery**: Alberta
* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

### Point of Contact
* **Contacter Name**: Susi Kosmulalage
* **Contact Email**: susi.kosmulalage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Attachments
No attachments are provided with this notice.

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the delivery of 14,000 metric tons of 3/4 inch well-graded gravel. Suppliers must be in compliance with all requirements specified in the tender notice and annexes, in order to consider a
